sentences.en: Aston Villaat Villa Park ever since 1897 when they left Perry Bar.
sentences.cn: 维拉公园球场,从1897年以来就一直是阿斯顿维拉的主球场,此前俱乐部的主球场是佩里酒吧.

sentences.en: But can't you maintain order there, Major Perry?
sentences.cn: 但你就不能维持那里的秩序吗, 佩里上校?

sentences.en: Cixin Kuanyin Perry hair style , face and head, wears Tiancheng.
sentences.cn: 此款观音佩头发高髻,面相丰满, 法相天成.

sentences.en: Cut it out, Perry. You've performed your heroics. It's all over now.
sentences.cn: 住手吧，佩里。你已经逞过英雄了。现在一切都结束了。

sentences.en: In many classrooms, Perry might simply have been regarded as a troublemaker.
sentences.cn: 在很多课堂上, 佩里可能都被认为是个捣蛋鬼.

sentences.en: Many are intimidated by terms such as RAM and gigabits, Perry said.
sentences.cn: 佩里说,许多人对诸如RAM和千兆位之类的术语望而生畏.

sentences.en: Mr. Perry had remonstrated with him about it.
sentences.cn: 关于这一点伯里先生还规劝过他.

sentences.en: Of course, if we got married, her name would be Halle Berry - Perry.
sentences.cn: 当然, 如果我们结婚的话, 她的名字就会变成哈里拜瑞派瑞.

sentences.en: Perry & aposs wit is so legendary that the scriptwriters have often incorporated his gags into the show.
sentences.cn: Perry 的机智简直可以用“传奇”来形容,以至编剧经常把他的插科打诨也写到剧集里.

sentences.en: Perry is not alone in his doubts.
Perry said. Nobody from the twice - daily group dropped out.
sentences.cn: 每天两次用药疗程组则无人退出.

sentences.en: Perry was a comforting man to have around when there was trouble.
sentences.cn: 每当出现麻烦的时候,有佩里在,人人都感到放心.

sentences.en: Surely he'll shed some light on Perry, hm?
sentences.cn: 他肯定会跟佩里互相沟通的, 对 吗 ?
